attrs.name: value
attrs.desc: Default value

attrs.name: tag-selectable
attrs.desc: Whether to enable copying of selected options in the text box
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: multiple
attrs.desc: Whether to enable the multi-user mode. The default value is false.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.desc: Whether to disable the user component
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: value-split
attrs.desc: Value Separator
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is,

attrs.name: popper-class
attrs.desc: Add a class name for the popper. For details, see the popover component.

attrs.name: popper-append-to-body
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to insert a pop-up box to the body element. When a fault occurs in the dialog box that is displayed, you can set this attribute to false (for details, see the select component).
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: sort-by-fetch-data
attrs.desc: The data sequence in the drop-down list box during association is the same as that returned by the interface.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: textSplit
attrs.desc: Text separator
attrs.defaultValue: Separator for text paste and copy query. The default value of this attribute is, .

attrs.name: value-field
attrs.desc: Value Field Mapping
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is userId.

attrs.name: text-field
attrs.desc: Display field mapping
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is userCN.

attrs.name: cache
attrs.desc: Whether to cache user data
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: cache-key
attrs.desc: Set the key value of cached data.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is tiny-user.

attrs.name: delay
attrs.desc: Set the loading delay time.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 600 ms.

attrs.name: suggest-length
attrs.desc: Load after the input length is set.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 3

attrs.name: cache-fields
attrs.desc: Set the user data to be cached.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is [].

attrs.name: fetchW3Accounts
attrs.desc: User-defined batch query service

attrs.name: fetchSuggestUser
attrs.desc: Customized input query service

attrs.name: placeholder
attrs.desc: Set the placeholder text in the text box

attrs.name: collapse-tags
attrs.desc: Whether to collapse tags when there are multiple users
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: collapse-show-overflow-tooltip
attrs.desc: Whether to omit the data that exceeds one line and display a tooltip.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: sortable
attrs.desc: User-defined drag-and-drop sorting. This attribute references the sortablejs plug-in for sorting.

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Set the user component size

attrs.name: allow-copy
attrs.desc: Indicates whether content in the text box can be copied in the single-choice search scenario. The attribute is transparently transferred to the internal Select component. For details, see the Select example.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false, indicating that the attribute cannot be copied.

events.name: error
events.desc: This event is triggered when no user information is matched.

events.name: change
events.desc: This event is triggered when the value changes.
